note:
Storyteller. 6 SF novels & assorted short works in print. Tiptree honors short list; Dick, & Analog finalist. Wild Cards contributor & episodic blogger. MSc engineer specializing in environmental/ sustainability tech, info systems, & software design. Interactive storytelling.

Spousal unit to cherished moop & fellow writer @StevenGould. Motherbeast of two; doggo treat dispenser. New Mexico nerd & Hatch chile lover. Sick af with MECFS.
